message: Let's make a deal, Bob. I take $70, you take $30. This seems fair to me considering the inflation working against you.
Alice, my turn. Let's be reasonable. I'll take $60, leaving you with $40. This deal makes more sense considering the inflation we both face.
Bob, this inflation is no joke. I'm offering you $35, which is more than you'd get if you wait any longer. I'll take $65.  Let's be smart and end this.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. I'm lowering my ask to $55, leaving you with $45.  Let's settle this now before we both lose out even more.
Bob, I'm trying to be fair, but this is getting ridiculous. $40 is the best you'll get at this point. Take it before it shrinks even more!
Alice, let's stop wasting time.  We're both getting hurt by this pointless standoff.  I propose a fair 50/50 split.  Take it or leave it, but let's end this now.
